values: Blessed Satisfaction: The Sin-Slaying, Soul-Staggering Glory of ChristBlessed Satisfaction: The Sin-Slaying, Soul-Staggering Glory of Christ

We were made to see and savor, with everlasting satisfaction, the soul-staggering glory of Christ. Only then will our lusts lose their power.We were made to see and savor, with everlasting satisfaction, the soul-staggering glory of Christ. Only then will our lusts lose their power.
